meanings.definition: Present participle of mascara: applying mascara to one's eyelashes.
meanings.sent1: She is mascaraing her eyelashes before the party.
meanings.sent2: I enjoy mascaraing my eyelashes to make them look longer.
meanings.sent3: He was caught mascaraing his eyelashes in the middle of the night.
meanings.sent4: Her eyelashes were like a forest after mascaraing them.
meanings.sent5: The act of mascaraing made her eyes pop with beauty.

meanings.definition: Present participle of mascara: pretending to be someone or something that one is not.
meanings.sent1: The spy was mascaraing as a tourist to gather information.
meanings.sent2: She was caught mascaraing as a famous celebrity at the event.
meanings.sent3: He tried mascaraing as a superhero but failed miserably.
meanings.sent4: Her disguise was so good that she was mascaraing as a completely different person.
meanings.sent5: Mascaraing as a villain, he fooled everyone with his act.
